name: Space Origin
description:
Space Origin is a fast-paced game all about surviving in an unforgiving space of deadly functions. You are the origin, on which all of these function converge.

Navigate this treacherous and keep your distance from the deadly parabolas, cosines and the rest with a powerful engine thruster. It might even come in handy to desintegrate these colorful enemies.

Controls:

W,A,D/Arrow keys: Spaceship control

Space: Heavy thrust burn

Ingredients:

Zero: Player is the origin of the vector space

Runes: The function sometimes drop powerful, mysterious looking pickups

At distance: Keep your distance from the deadly functions

(Genius Loci): Survive the deadly spirit of Maths

Made by: Ondřej Vereš and Cyril Janeček
